text:
Greetings to all! I'm a final year undergrad at IIT Kanpur, India. Recently came across Julia for performing large-scale simulations. I've been looking into contributing for open sourced projects and would love to contribute to this community. I've sound background in Numerical Methods, Chemical Engg.(Majoring), Linear algebra and DEs.
Any suggested channels aligning with my interests? Thanks in advance :)

elements.text:

text: I'm in a group implementing a lot of EoS in pure julia (mainly SAFT models, more to come), check OpenSAFT.jl. We are missing flash calculations for now, but progress, is steady!
